course.title: Introduction to the Hebrew Bible/Old Testament 1: Pentateuch and Former Prophets
course.description: A critical introduction to the literature and theology of the Hebrew Bible, considered in light of the historical contexts of its formation and the interpretive contexts of its reception within Judaism and Christianity. The course, the first part of a divisible, year-long sequence, will focus on the major biblical narrative traditions, the Pentateuch and Former Prophets.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 1102.
